## lineIntersection() function

Compute the intersection of the two lines.  lineIntersection 

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function lineIntersection(l1: LineXY, l2: LineXY): PointXY | null;
```

|  l1 | [LineXY](./util.linexy) |  |
|  l2 | [LineXY](./util.linexy) |  A point if an intersection found, null otherwise. |
